item.title: Tools, Tools, Tools - Episode 006
item.author: Mostly Node
item.description:
1. Exercism.io

2. Atom

  • Packages
    • highlight-selected
    • atom-beautify
    • minimap
    • minimap-highlight-selected
    • tab-switcher
    • auto-detect-indentation
    • sync-settings
    • linter
    • linter-js-standard
    • file-icons
    • standard-formatter
    • atom-jade
    • javascript-standard-snippets
    • multi-cursor
    • pigments
    • open-recent
    • react
  • Snippets
    • Making Custom Snippets in Atom
  • Key Commands
    • Re-Mapping Windows to OS X
    • Atom Docs : Keymaps in-Depth

3. Nodemon

4. Postman

5. Alfred


Links (Additional items referenced on the show):

  • Therapeutic Refactoring by Katrina Owen
  • Comma Separating Javascript Variables
  • Httpster
  • Getting React and ES6 Syntax Highlighting in Sublime Text

item.title: Money Back Guarantee - Episode 005
item.author: Mostly Node
item.description:
1. Marketing to Clients

2. Sequelize

3. Today I accept that Rails is yesterday’s software

  • “Platforms like node.js suffer the exact same problems. We need new thinking, not just repackaging of the same old failures. I should be spending time writing code, not debugging a haystack of mutable, dependency-wired mess.”


Links (Additional items referenced on the show):

  • https://www.npmjs.com/package/mysql
  • http://knexjs.org

item.title: Hey, That's Us! - Episode 004
item.author: Mostly Node
item.description:
Intro - The podcast is growing!

2. Switching to Atom

  • Atom Keybindings - http://flight-manual.atom.io/behind-atom/sections/keymaps-in-depth/
  • Webstorm Pricing - https://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/buy/#edition=commercial

3. Async - https://github.com/caolan/async


Links (Additional items referenced on the show):

  • https://blog.risingstack.com/asynchronous-javascript/
